description: oshi Early Recovery Project (KERP) will provide early recovery assistance to those households affected by the flood caused in August 2008, when the Koshi river reached its eastern embankment and four VDCs in Sunsari district were flooded.

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to reduce the impact of disasters, especially climate change related disasters, on vulnerable communities
subproject.description: The Koshi Early Recovery Programme (KERP) will provide early recovery assistance to those households affected by the flood caused in August 2008, when the Koshi river breached its eastern embankment and four Village Development Committees in Sunsari District were flooded, causing significant damage to infrastructure, crops, arable land, shelters, and many other assets.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Koshi Early Recovery Project

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
